statements.select: SELECT aap.AcbeginAccountPayableDetailId,aap.AcbeginAccountPayableId, s.SupplierId,aap.DomesticAdvancePayment, aap.DomesticBeginningBalance, aap.AdvancePayment,aap.ShouldPayment,aap.DomesticAccountPayable, aap.AlreadyPayment,aap.DomesticAlreadyPayment,aap.BeginningBalance FROM Supplier s Left JOIN AcbeginAccountPayableDetail aap ON 1!=1
